p: Acacia nilotica belongs to the family Fabaceae. A methanolic extract from the leaves of Acacia nilotica had strong antiviral activity against hepatitis C virus (HCV). 39 A dichloromethane extract of Ruta angustifolia leaves had a potent anti-HCV activity with an IC 50 value of 1.6 ± 0.3 μg/mL 37 ( Table 1).
